name: clash-verge-rev
title: Clash Verge Rev
description: Switch Clash Verge Rev proxy modes and nodes quickly
author: jun

preferences.name: clashApiUrl
preferences.title: Clash API URL
preferences.description: Clash API URL, defaults to http://127.0.0.1:9097

preferences.name: clashSecret
preferences.title: Clash API Secret
preferences.description: Clash API authentication secret, leave empty to disable authentication

preferences.name: autoCloseConnections
preferences.title: Auto Close Connections
preferences.description: Automatically close existing connections when switching modes or nodes
preferences.label: Enable auto close connections

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
